Kon Ham Where I write about everything

Onwards [Poetry]

01 Feb 2021

The world is full of pain and suffering

Everyday humanity aches and throbs

Our suffering points direction to our future home

As we cope and bear our crippled walk

Hope gives us respite, a cool shade from the blistering sun

So for today I’ll smile a little more and laugh a little louder

Today I’ll set in stone a future better than is today

Build for the future generations – laughs and smiles from the past
